channel.title: Investing on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Investing on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 15
item.description: This week I tinkered with my laptop’s graphic configuration, I messed up and had to spent a day working inside a tty, fortunately I am an avid terminal user and could live without a graphical interface and also the same day, albeit almost at midnight, I could fix the problem. Now I can use the Nvidia graphics card that came with my laptop and can peek into the PC master race lifestyle.
